ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed, it is one of their blatant lies to say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Is it not a lie invented by them when they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, it is one of their fabrications that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is only because of their false invention that they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Pay heed! It is their slander that they say. –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is of their falsehood that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Now surely it is of their own lie that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Is it not of their own calumny that they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is of their falsehood that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No indeed! It is one of their fabrications when they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lo! verily it is of their falsehood that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Be aware that it is out of their mendacity that they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is it not that they say, from their own invention,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, it is of their falsehood that they (Quraish pagans) say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then is it of their lying that they say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No indeed! It is one of their lies when they say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:151] Lo! it is indeed out of their [own] mendacity, their [own] lies, that they say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! it is of their falsehood) it is due to their denial (that they say:
